intro:
Get your hands on crystals!!
Play in split-screen multiplayer for 1-4 players!
30 stages in total! normal and hard difficulty!
description:
Your goal is to use jumps and dashes to obtain crystals on the stage.
The stage is a 3D space with vertical, horizontal, and depth. Gravity is present, and players control their character by moving forward, backward, left, right, and vertically with jumps to reach the crystal.

Features
- Clear the stage once you obtain a crystal!
- 30 stages in total!
- Choose the difficulty level: Normal mode is relatively easy to clear. Hard mode is extremely challenging.
- Collect coins and crystals will appear!
- Split-screen play for up to four players is supported!
- Use items to improve your abilities!

Multiplayer
- Work together to collect coins!
- Be the first to obtain a crystal!
